Common.name: Common
Common.description: High Mana Regen. Best for mana hungry heroes.

Tank.name: Tank
Tank.description: High HP at the start of the game. Best Emblem for tanks.

Mage.name: Mage
Mage.description: Huge magic power at the start of the game. Only for magic damage heroes.

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.description: High Penetration. Suitable for burst assasin heroes.

Fighter.name: Fighter
Fighter.description: High Spell Vamp. Suitable for frontlaner sustain heroes.

Marksman.name: Marksman
Marksman.description: High Attack Speed. Suitable for basic attack rely heroes.

Support.name: Support
Support.description: Emblem With Healing Effect Boost. Suitable for support heroes that can heal.

Firmness.name: Firmness
Firmness.description: Gain 6 Physical Defense and 6 Magic Defense

Fatal.name: Fatal
Fatal.description: Gain 5% extra Crit Chance and 10% extra Crit Damage

Life Drain.name: Life Drain
Life Drain.description: Minion Kills Grant HP Regen, Getting a kill or assist on an enemy restores 3% HP and 1.5% Mana

Seasoned Hunter.name: Seasoned Hunter
Seasoned Hunter.description: Increase Jungling Speed, Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution

Tenacity.name: Tenacity
Tenacity.description: Increase Defense at Low HP, When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magical Defense are increased by 18.

Master Assassin.name: Master Assassin
Master Assassin.description: Increase Damage to Lone Heroes, If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 4%.

Bargain Hunter.name: Bargain Hunter
Bargain Hunter.description: Reduce Equipment Cost, Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

Festival of Blood.name: Festival of Blood
Festival of Blood.description: Get Extra Spell Vamp, Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

Pull Yourself Together.name: Pull Yourself Together
Pull Yourself Together.description: Reduce CD of Battle Spells & Equipment skill, Cooldowns of Batlle Spells and equipments active skills are reduced by 15%.

Weapon Master.name: Weapon Master
Weapon Master.description: Gains Bonus Attack from Equipments, Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

Wilderness Blessing.name: Wilderness Blessing
Wilderness Blessing.description: Extra Movement Speed in Jungle and River., Movement Speed in the Jungle and River is Increased by 15%. This bonus is halved when in combat with enemy heroes, Lord or Turtle.

Impure Rage.name: Impure Rage
Impure Rage.description: Extra Skill Damage & Restore Mana on Hit, Dealing damage with skills deals an extra 50-250 Adaptive Damage (scales with level) and restores 2% Mana on hit.

Quantum Charge.name: Quantum Charge
Quantum Charge.description: Basic Attacks Grant HP Regen & Speed Up, Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 40% for 1.5s and restores 75-180HP (scales with level)

Concussive Blast.name: Concussive Blast
Concussive Blast.description: HP-Based AOE Damage, after the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+7% Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Killing Spree.name: Killing Spree
Killing Spree.description: Regen and Speed Up After Kill, After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 8% Max HP and gain 15% Movement Speed for 3s.

Lethal Ignition.name: Lethal Ignition
Lethal Ignition.description: Extra Damage on Multi-Hits, Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 Adaptive Damage (scales with level)

Brave Smite.name: Brave Smite
Brave Smite.description: Skill Damage Grants HP Regen, Dealing skill damage to an enemy restores 5% Max HP.

Focusing Mark.name: Focusing Mark
Focusing Mark.description: Enhance Ally Damage, Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

Weakness Finder.name: Weakness Finder
Weakness Finder.description: Basic Attacks Slow Enemies, Basic Attacks have a 20% chance to reduce the enemy hero's Movement Speed by 90% and Attack Speed by 50% for 0.5s.
